title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants: The Complete Collection
description: LENA, CARMEN, BRIDGET, and Tibby have been through a lot together. But even after traveling across the world to keep these four very different friends connected, the pants remain strong, uncuffedâ€”and remarkably flattering. Relive the magic of the pants with these four novels of strength, heartbreak, love, family, and friendship.
author: Ann Brashares
